Task_Description: Create backup script and schedule it

LLM_Suggestion_1: New-Item -ItemType File -Name backup.ps1 -Value "Copy-Item -Path source -Destination backup"; Register-ScheduledJob -Name BackupJob -FilePath backup.ps1 -Trigger (New-JobTrigger -At 2am -Daily)

Final_Command: New-Item -ItemType File -Name backup.ps1 -Value "Copy-Item -Path source -Destination backup"; Register-ScheduledJob -Name BackupJob -FilePath backup.ps1 -Trigger (New-JobTrigger -At 2am -Daily)
